Name: Chicken Holmes - Chanislavski Whispers

The second game of our greatest Chicken This game will continue our most impressive, nonsense and marvelous animal adventure, now better because of the alternate reality. Have fun (or horror) in this new step of our 'heros' journey. Without your help they won't be able to solve this case. Their brains are equivalent to approximately 10% of your, as Judite tells me.
